![](http://conn8ct.com/images/logo.png)


If you need a Powerful & more custom Hosting Environment than a traditional Shared/Reseller hosting, then our Fully Managed Virtual Servers are for you. We handle the server management so you can focus on your websites, not server side tasks.

**All of our Servers’ come with** - 
_Elegance, Performance, Full Features. No Compromise_

Conn8ct's virtual private server is a combination of enterprise hardware, rock solid network, and a support team that goes the extra mile for you. Our platform is purely built on High End Enterprise hardware to eliminate the most common speed issue's and to reveal the best performance for busy forums, e-commerce websites, and database intensive applications.


_**At Conn8ct, we believe If a job is worth doing, it's worth doing well.**_

<br />**Who are we?**
<br />[Conn8ct](www.conn8ct.com) is a privately owned and operated company providing you with Fully Managed Virtual Private Servers and Fully Managed Dedicated Servers with the foundation of our company built on customer support. 

<br />We provide a all in all service from domain name and hosting services to students, individuals and businesses assisting in providing a full on solution. With our corporate headquarters located in London, United Kingdom and offices in Greece our network operations center staffed around the clock in Florida, you can be rest assured that we're committed to providing you with excellence. 

<br /> As a leading UK secure hosting company our priority is to give our customers the best possible online user experience, assisting and handing over reliable services at affordable prices.
